metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16358 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - untriaged
metadata.Description:
In radare 2.0.1, an out-of-bounds read vulnerability exists instring_scan_range() in libr/bin/bin.c when doing a string search.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16358` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libradare2-2.3 - 2.3.0+dfsg-2
libradare2-common - 2.3.0+dfsg-2
radare2 - 2.3.0+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: radare2 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.0+dfsg-2').
